name: Alpine Rescue
description:
Have you ever wondered what it feels like to work in a team of mountain rescuers? 
Have you ever been curious about what the procedures are to help someone in danger, whether they've broken a leg, gotten lost in a forest at night or been swept away by an avalanche?
Experience all of this in Alpine Rescue, the newest mountain rescue simulator created on Unity.
A project born out of a Virtual Reality course of the Polytechnic University of Turin, Alpine Rescue is ideal both for kids and adults who want to have a glimpse of what it's like to work in such an environment.

With 3 different scenarios (Rescue by Helicopter, Rescue by Canine Team and Self-Rescue in Avalanche), you'll get to live many unforgettable experiences that will help you out in real life too. 

Never risk finding yourself in the middle of an avalanche not knowing what to do! Try Alpine Rescue, out now. 

(Note: the game is currently available in Italian only)
